name: Tie The Knot (GMTK Game Jam 2021)
description:
This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2021.

Help The Groom Reach His Soon-To-Be Wife By Drawing Rope Slides For The Groom To Slide On.

Click The Groom To Start. Click & Drag To Draw. Press R To Undo. Press Esc To Pause.

Click Arrows To See Above View.

Collect Hearts To Jump Upwards.

Avoid Walls.

Credits: 

Music - "Calm BGM" by syncopika (opengameart.org) Sounds - "SE_refresh" by Chanhun,  "sf3-sfx-menu-select" by broumbroum,  "Bounce" by JustInvoke "Correct Blips" by Eponn (freesound.org) Art - " Flare Effect with Blender" by Clint Bellanger, "Hearts - Set 01"  by GameArtForge, "Sunny Background" by cynthiayosha, "Glow Arrow" by oglsdl, "Game wood panel" by PINKCANNON, "VillageBuildings - Green Faction (Kids from Catan inspired)" by Spring, Seamless Wall by GrumpyDiamond (opengameart.org) "Simple Flower Drawings" by Evan Williams (itch.io)
